title: Slip of the tongue
creator_credit: Bob Scarfe and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Considers the issue of speech problems in the classroom in terms of what type of problems are referrable to a speech pathologist. Presents teachers with a guide to what speech problems to look out for in the classroom. Describes language, articulation, voice and fluency.
